channel.title: New help with this! (Unspawnable Items) 525
channel.description:
Alright guys, so i have been trying to do this all day and some of it yesterday, but i cant figure out how to do it.
This is my code.. [code]if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); } if (c.inWild()) return; if(newItemID == 6570 || newItemID == 11777) return; try { if (args.length == 3) { int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount) } else { c.sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Use as ::item 995 200"); } } catch (Exception e) {
}
It gives me this error! [code]src\server\model\players\Player.java:77: error: illegal start of expression public int[] unspawnableItems = [15272]; ^ src\server\model\players\Player.java:77: error: illegal start of type public int[] unspawnableItems = [15272]; ^ src\server\model\players\Player.java:77: error: <identifier> expected public int[] unspawnableItems = [15272]; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:140: error: ';' expected c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount)
^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:824: error: illegal start of expr ession public void moderatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:824: error: illegal start of expr ession public void moderatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:824: error: ';' expected public void moderatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:824: error: ';' expected public void moderatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:824: error: not a statement public void moderatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:824: error: ';' expected public void moderatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1106: error: illegal start of exp ression public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)//Admin Com mands Start Here!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !! ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1106: error: illegal start of exp ression public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)//Admin Com mands Start Here!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !! ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1106: error: ';' expected public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)//Admin Com mands Start Here!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !! ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1106: error: ';' expected public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)//Admin Com mands Start Here!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !! ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1106: error: not a statement public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)//Admin Com mands Start Here!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !! ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1106: error: ';' expected public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)//Admin Com mands Start Here!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !! ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1860: error: illegal start of exp ression public void ownerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)///Owner Commands S TART HERE!!!!!!!!@@@@@@!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1860: error: illegal start of exp ression public void ownerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)///Owner Commands S TART HERE!!!!!!!!@@@@@@!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1860: error: ';' expected public void ownerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)///Owner Commands S TART HERE!!!!!!!!@@@@@@!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1860: error: ';' expected public void ownerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)///Owner Commands S TART HERE!!!!!!!!@@@@@@!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1860: error: not a statement public void ownerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)///Owner Commands S TART HERE!!!!!!!!@@@@@@!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1860: error: ';' expected public void ownerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)///Owner Commands S TART HERE!!!!!!!!@@@@@@!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:2469: error: illegal start of exp ression public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:2469: error: illegal start of exp ression public void item.description:
@Fisher9696 wrote:

Sure you did it right? Works for me.

Yeah look this is the code

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { try { int[] UNSPAWNABLE = {1038,1040,1045}; String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); for (int d : UNSPAWNABLE) { if (args.length == 3) { if (Integer.parseInt(args[1]) == d && c.playerRights < 2) { c.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item."); return; } } } if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 20500 && newItemID > 0) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } } catch(Exception e) { } }

[size=18pt]Thats right isnt it?[/size]

item.title: New help with this! (Unspawnable Items) 525
item.dc:creator: @Fisher9696 Fisher9696
item.description:
@Fisher9696 wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:14, topic:462649”][quote author=Fisher9696 link=topic=565838.msg4115865#msg4115865 date=1349034668]

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { try { int[] UNSPAWNABLE = {1038,1040,1045}; String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); for (int d : UNSPAWNABLE) { if (args.length == 3) { if (Integer.parseInt(args[1]) == d) { c.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item."); return; } } } if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 20500 && newItemID > 0) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Invalid arguments. ::item [ID] [Amount]"); } } ;D

Sorry, I made a mistake.

One more question… how do i make it to where me the owner can spawn it as well as admins. But still make it to where everyone else can spawn the other items… Thanks and the other code worked! much appreciated!!!
;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D

[/quote]

Replace this line

if (Integer.parseInt(args[1]) == d) {

With

if (Integer.parseInt(args[1]) == d && c.playerRights < 2) { [/quote]

It lets me spawn the item if i put that in there.

item.title: New help with this! (Unspawnable Items) 525
item.dc:creator: @Fisher9696 Fisher9696
item.description:
@Fisher9696 wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:10, topic:462649”][code=java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
int[] UNSPAWNABLE = {1040, 1038, 1045};
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
for (int d = 0; d < UNSPAWNABLE.length; d++) {
if (Integer.parseInt(args[1]) == d) {
c.sendMessage(“You can’t spawn this item.”);
return;
}
}
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Invalid arguments. ::item [ID] [Amount]”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

		} 
	}[/code][/quote]

What the hell! it still lets me spawn those items. Im so confused.

if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {

item.title: New help with this! (Unspawnable Items) 525
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

				if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
				try {
					int[] UNSPAWNABLE = { 1,2,3 };
					String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
					for (int d = 0; d < UNSPAWNABLE.length; d++) {
					if (Integer.parseInt(args[1]) == d) {
					c.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item.");
					return;
					}
				}

This makes it so certain items you can’t spawn, add the items in UNSPAWNABLE

You will need to add the rest of the code however you want it.

return;

return;
try {

if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount)
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::item 995 200”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
